CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 2, 1965, pg. 7 reads: "50th Wedding Anniversary - Mr. and Mrs. Charles Harper Sr. were feted at a beautiful reception, Sunday afternoon, at Loendi Club, on the occasion of their 50th wedding anniversary. The affair, attended by family and friends, was given by their four sons and three daughters, who are pictured above with their parents.  Left to right, seated: Charles Harper Jr., Mrs. Charles Harper Sr. and Mr. Harper, the honorees, looking over some of their cards, and Mrs. Wilda Harper Sellers.  Standing: Nathaniel and Walt Harper; Mrs. Doryce Harper Allen, all of Pittsburgh ;Mrs. Allice Harper Ellis of Newark, N.J.; Ernest Harper of Chicago, Ill., and the Rev. Charles Foggie, who performed the renewal rites. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Fiftieth wedding anniversary party of Lucinda and Charles Harper at the Loendi Club, including seated: Charles Harper, Jr., Lucinda Harper, Charles Harper, Wilda Harper Sellers; standing: Nathaniel (Nate) Harper, Walt Harper, Doris Harper Bowdry, Alice Harper Ellis, Ernest (Ernie) Harper, and Rev. Charles Foggie
